caption: BLT has amazing customer service and even better food.  I ordered BLT on Grubhub for a special occasion and it never showed up.  BLT helped make it right and the food was top notch.

I will NOT eat at a location that rewards anyone for getting the Covid vaccine. This world and everyone in it has gone insane. Family and friends have been told what they are doing and none of us will return. Hope they go under!

Chicken was bloody so I sent it back and got another chicken. Didn't eat it in the restaurant. Got home and that chicken was bloody as well. Crab cakes were not lump mostly breading but ok flavor. The asparagus and wine were great. The …
Always enjoy a date night here. The people watching is phenomenal!
Everything was excellent

It was delicious. Ambience is magnificent. The staff is attentive. I have no idea about the price as it was a surprise date for me. There's valet parking at the Ritz-Carlton, which is where the restaurant is located. #DateNight
Great food and customer service.
Great food and environment

I returned a few days ago after a long hiatus due to not traveling as much and I am sad to report that a lot has changed at BLT Steak. The restaurant was half empty when we arrived and after standing around for close to ten minutes I …

My husband and I️ traveled out of town for our anniversary and thought it would be a great idea to stop in and try BLT Steak for the first time. Our experience was absolutely horrible! We entered the restaurant and literally stood for 10 …

My husband and I went here for the first time last year and it was wonderful! Definitely the fanciest restaurant we’ve ever been in. It was very busy and the bar atmosphere was very lively but the dinning area was very calm. It did take a …

If, I could give this place " Zero Star's " I would. The atmosphere was nice.... but the Food wasn't all that for the Price. The Service was horrible!!! Our Waiter was very Rude and Sarcastic the whole time. She was very Unprofessional! She …
My husband and I were celebrating our 26th anniversary. The service and food were AMAZING!  Thank you for helping to make our evening wonderful.
Great food and atmosphere. Left credit card and they mailed it back to me. Great people , great place , great food.
I love this place, great food & service. The staff was very welcoming and observant. It has a good interior. Feels similar to a restaurant in New York I loved.
Delicious and great friendly service
Ambiance a 2 Food a 9..
Excellent.  The bacon appetizer was delicious!!  I could have eaten that with the bread for my meal.  Will be back!!
Tasty food and amazing customer service!! Everything I’ve ever ordered from here is absolutely delicious!! Complimentary valet parking is also a plus. Would definitely recommend 100%.
Amazing steak and pimento cheese sandwich. Very friendly staff and overall amazing experience. Will definitely come back
A larger menu selection would be great.
Excellent food and attentive service
Best in NY!

I ordered a chopped veggie salad with chicken at 330pm over the phone for me to pick up at 530pm. I get there 535pm. Salad is not ready. They say the order was not placed. This is 2 hours already. I ask how much is the salad. 3 customers …
Warm and inviting environment for the perfect date night.
Expensive!!! But you get what you pay for. I had the small filet. It was the best steak I can remember having. Maybe Best ever and I raise beef cattle and eat a lot of steak.

The atmosphere was really nice and staff was sort friendly.  I was super disappointed with my ribeye though. I ordered it med well and it came out extra well done with c charred edges. Talk about super disappointed. Everything else was good.
Steak and popovers. Rinse. Repeat.
Wonderful service, and amazing food!! Perfect experience
The best Sword Fish in the city.

The service from the time we entered the door until we left was wonderful and the food was fantastic... Our waiter Mike D. was awesome and he made us feel like we were his only table. His recommendations did not disappoint. Made our Valentine's day that much better.
Awesome as always
It's a good place to  eat
Great food and great service.
Excellent food and service!!!

The most rude and unfriendly customer service I have ever received from a restaurant.  We will promptly be cancelling our reservation.  Too many amazing restaurants in Charlotte to give a place like this our business.  Customer comes last.

Thanks 🤗 for a great Dining experience. We loved the food and wanted our left overs to go. Our gracious waitress packed our left overs. We realized when home. Some of our food was not packed. Not much for kids, but a delightful experience for them. Thanks
Wonderful
Great steakhouse! The service was great, nice cocktail list and a long wine list! They had the normal steak options, everyone’s steaks were cooked to perfection! Don’t forget the pop overs!

Since moving to Charlotte 2 years ago, this is definitely my favorite place to eat when I’m looking for a 5 star meal. The Rack of Lamb is mouth watering and the choice of steak cuts are second to none, along with a nice selection of À la …
Great service!!!
I prefer this restaurant very much. It has a different atmosphere. The kitcen is good. the service is powerful and the personel is polite. The cost is reasonable. I warmly recommend.
Amazing food
Service was great as always....and the food was exceptional!
Seems like a great place to eat but I was there picking up grubhub
Awesome food and service
Great service, weird food

Food quality and price are grossly out of alignment. For $46 I consumed a rib eye that would have been "ok" at a Texas Roadhouse or equivalent.  The flavor was not bad nor was it memorable. The cut and meat quality was not what is expected …
Great food and ambience! A must try is the beets and carmelized brussel sprouts!

Had the greatest service of all.   This Ritz location is beautiful.   The pastries and chocolates are wonderful.  Macarons were fantastic as well. Coffee shop employee told me they have a jazz night with live bands.   Have to come back for that!!
But way too expensive

I honestly expected this to be like Del Frisco’s or another high end steak chain, but was really impressed. We had a business group for dinner on a Monday night and there were few other tables. I’ve never seen Brussels sprouts the size of …

Went for lunch and was totally and completely disappointed...not with service but with food. Ordered the Asian chicken salad and my husband ordered the lobster cobb salad...which was $27.  These salads looked awful when they came out...not …

SO SLOW! Poor service...Go elsewhere. For the price this place is a joke. Go to Ruth Chris for a superior experience in every possible way. What a disappointing experience. I was really looking forward to trying this place. Wasn't meant to be.

I visited during winter 2019 restaurant week.  The name of the restaurant drawled me to this choice and I have also seen it in passing while exploring uptown. I selected the steak and potatoes as my main meal. The Prime sirloin cook in a …
Good, not great. Was expecting a world class steak. #boneinfillet

Yes, it is like a chain (International restaurant group) and yes, I typically wouldn't do a review here, but I happened to meet an employee and he sold me on it. Plus the chef is a local, so gotta support that, right? We did the porterhouse …
Love the food here! Love the portion size of their delicious side options. Great for sharing. Steak cooked well and I will be back !
NY strip was amazing

Stay somewhere else but come to this restaurant. Very nice array of appetizers. Great service for a table of ten. Very helpful with wine selections. Attentive. Entrees were great. Nice selection of desserts we all shared. Steaks were cooked …

Had the BLT burger.  Was great.  Staff was friendly and attentive with drink refills (water).  Seated right away, and was pretty full of people when we left.  Would defi,Italy recommend.  Friends had burgers and salads and very pleased with their food.
Amazing food! The popover bread is soooo good. If you go, go just for that. I had the salmon and it was delicious, my asparagus was too salty but the rest of the meal was great.
Drinks are bad and don't have too many options for wines, very disappointed. Service was excellent...
My boyfriend and I went there last night. The service was very good, but the food was mediocre at best. My food wasn't warm and absolutely wasn't worth the price. It was all expensive and overrated.
Had a wonderful time and the live band was fantastic.

Absolutely loved this restaurant...The service was top of the line...the workers were so in sync with each other,  as one removed the plates, another was there to clean the table, and yet another with water and/or beverage..The Manager was …
Great steak. It's always a great place where you can go and eat a good steak. I love this place.
We visited for Charlotte Restaurant Week July 2019 and thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. The Braised Short Ribs are absolutely TO DIE FOR.
For a better than average steakhouse the service is very strong. The food meanwhile is middle of the road. There are better places in Charlotte.
Wow!
Great atmosphere and service. I ordered the small filet with the half lobster tail and brussel sprouts. Everything was delicious and cooked to perfection.
Over priced menu as it's in a hotel and in Uptown. But incredible home made bread and butter

We had dinner on a recent trip to Charlotte.  Decor was nice.  Service good and friendly and efficient.  Steak was cooked just right and was tender but lacked flavor.  Entire menu was pricey for the location and quality of food IMO.
Great bar staff Inesse was awesome very prompt and friendly. Good drinks and some of the best steaks in town.

We sat at the bar and had an amazing experience. Staff was on point through the whole meal and never rushed us.  Popovers were amazing, shrimp cocktail had very large shrimp with two options for dipping sauce.  Bacon appetizer is a must …
Really good service, gorgeous facility
Good place.  That bread they brought in the beginning was amazing.  The Moody Burger was ok.
Great food and service.  They have really good breakfast and lunch selections.
Good lobster salad
Delicious.
Service was outstanding and the sides and appetizers (and dessert) were good, but my filet was poorly butchered and a tad overdone
Really delicious!!

I came in for a drink 2 weeks ago and have been back everyday since. Monica and Ineze at the bar are top notch. It's my favorite place to hang out when I'm in Charlotte. Doug, the manager, is always hospitable and extremely friendly. You …

Food is consistently delicious,  the staff is always friendly knowledgeable, and on point with whatever your needs are.  There are always fun specials. Great seating adds to the fun and lively atmosphere.  Also when dining  with children you get the same lovely service.
As someone who cooks for a living and that is in the restaurant business I literally have nothing bad to say service was excellent food was on a different level of flavorful.
never disappoints
Great lunch! Food and service were very good.
Great atmosphere and food. Wonderful staff. The Popovers are amazing!!
Expensive & small portions but tasty
It's the Ritz Carlton... enough said

Abysmal...I ordered the filet after ordering a 250 dollar bottle of wine and received the meat with the string still around it and unable to cut through it...the bartender and server were disgusted but when bringing it to the managers …
Amazing service and the best crab cakes
Really good food
Great food and service. I recommend the steaks and crab cakes!

4 stars for the service, which was amazing. The popover bread, wedge salad, tuna tartare, and the complimentary pate were all delicious.  The steak (12oz filet) could have been better, though. First, 12oz is a lot. But it's the only filet …
Great food
Amazing 5 star experience. Great staff at the bar.
Excellent service, delicious food...get the baked potato.  I know it sounds weird, but you can thank me later.
Tons of celebrities here on this night. Great food. Amazing staff. High class.
Lobster salad was great. Nice wine selection. Our waitress Donna was outstanding.

Very nice place located inside the Ritz with a convenient street entrance. Nice decor and ambience. I choose the Mac and cheese as an appetizer it was very tasty. The stuffed chicken breast was just ok. Very tender but I would not order …

I'll preface my review with the fact it is restaurant week, which I'm sure affected our experience.  With that said, this was our third year in a row celebrating my son's birthday here. We arrived 20 minutes before our reservation and were …
Excellent steak and excellent service. I would not recommend the butternut squash soup.
Great food, good music, and  friendly staff
Ambience is Top Notch,  Popover, Caesar salad and garlic Sirloin were all delicious, professional waitstaff made this a meal to remember!
Great food, great service, great environment.
The Wagyu skirt steak was unexpectedly delicious. I mean, I knew it would be good, but I was surprised at just HOW good. A level 10 beef experience.
Good steak- nice atmosphere- decent whisky list- likely the best steak house in Charlotte.
I had the rack of lamb and brussel sprouts. It was delicious and paired well with the merlot. I would definitely recommend dining here.
Wonderful fine dining with a few extra treats
The whole experience of this restaurant is very warm and very nice. The pop-overs were so delicious, and every meal our party ordered from the menu were all so delicious.

Great steak! The service is exceptional! Never seen better service. Not a fan of the pâté that they bring out with a special type of bread. The baked potato was good, but know it is almost the size of a football....seriously.... you can …

Always a pleasure dining here.  Food is consistently delicious,  the staff is always friendly knowledgeable, and on point with whatever your needs are.  There are always fun specials. Great seating adds to the fun and lively atmosphere.  Also when dining  with children you get the same lovely service.
Great dining experience.
Really great experience. The food was well prepared, drinks were well made, and nice atmosphere overall. Would highly recommend.

We had a wonderful time here. They did not disappoint. Danny our server was great. I let him make the decision on pretty much all our selections and everything was top notch. Look forward to returning.
My favorite Steakhouse in Beverly Hills ! The filet mignon is absolutely the best ! Love the atmospehere and the cocktails . Great wine selection .
Fabulous food and service! We wandered in after the Hornets game.. we weren’t  sure what to expect. BLT exceeded every expectation. Highly recommend!
Great food, especially for meat lovers.

I wish I could give a review about the food, especially after wanting to go here for so long. But when we received our appetizers and a whole live spider crawled out of my wedge salad we decided to just leave. Manager couldn't have been less apologetic.
Everything is amazing, but the passion fruit crepe souffle is out of this world!
Excellent lunch.

I went to BLT for the first time a few weeks ago for brunch, and it was absolutely outstanding.  I had the filet and a side of eggs, and I tried a couple of the specialty cocktails.  Everything was fantastic.  The service was also top notch, and the place itself has great ambiance.  I will definitely be back.
Amazing!!! Wedge salad, filet and crab cakes 😋😋😋😋
Awesome place !!! Service was second to none !!! Highly recommend !!!
Pricey but nice place, great food good service.
Great food, and located in uptown.
Mediocre at best. I’ll go there if someone else is paying. Go to Fleming’s, way better or even capital grill.

My 4 person business meeting had an excellent experience here. We all enjoyed our meals but were blown away by the popovers! Service was just the right amount of attention. Food was fresh. Fries were amazing! Great service and recommendations from our server.
Beautiful place. Food was a bit cold.
Excellent service. Amazing presentation. Fabulous taste. Incredible atmosphere.
Delicious and excellent service!
Missed Bret today... absolute the best restauranter in the business,  ever!
Popovers are awesome.  The place is pricey, but worth it!

The food was ok not great. The hostess was very rude and uninviting. The only great thing was we visited on a Saturday and listened to the best Live Jazz in the Lobby. Not what we expected for a High-end restaurant.

Atmosphere was okay, sat super close to other people. Tables very close together, which does not make for a romantic setting. We asked for ice water, but never got any ice cubes so the water was luke warm during dinner. The bread looked …
Everything is good.
The food and service were beyond excellent. I've never had onion rings like that before. That potato was big enough for 2.
Perfect service every time and consistent food.
Delicious steaks and entrees, interestingly unique appetizers and breads, good service. Ritz quality!
Great steak, great service!
Restaurant was nice, food ok.
Delicious and great service!

Had a great time with my in-laws, would go back if someone else picked the restaurant, but wouldn't recommend it on its own. Two of the steaks were cold (the butter wouldn't even melt...and they needed the butter to add flavor...badly). …
Fine dining in Charlotte.
It took them 2 tries to deliver medium rare,  so I wouldn't call this a top steak house.  Recommend Capital Grille instead.
Wow!  Very impressive!!  One of my top 20 in US.
Phenomenal service. Timing of each course was impressive.
Great experience.
Delicious food, great service
Pricy,  good food

Went there last night with my brother. Brie greeted us at the front and had us seated promptly. Our server Sam was awesome. The food was cooked to perfection, the wait staff was quick and helpful, and overall it was an amazing experience. I will definitely be going back for more!
One of the best Ribeye Steaks I have ever had, and the grilled asparagus was amazing.
I never back.
Great service. Attentive staff took very good precautions preparing gluten free meal for my girlfriend.
Amazing service and spectacular food. The sommelier paired foods perfectly. The eggs benedict for brunch were the best I've ever eaten.
Food was amazing and the service spot on
Omelette is the absolute best and there lobster salad is delicious. Both pair nicely with the great staff and atmosphere

One of the best steaks in Charlotte.  Some great sides, too.  They have some jalapeno mashed potatoes that are amazing (see picture). The prices reflect the quality, however.  But, by far, what makes this one of the is the friendliness, attentiveness, and knowledge of the servers.  We had a great time and will be back.

My favorite steakhouse in charlotte by far. The POPOVERS are out of this world. My husband and I get the porterhouse steak for 2 and it is worth every bite. We also go for work lunches and the Lobster Cobb salad is so amazing. The Tuna …
Excellent service and excellent food, with Jazz following the meal.
The service was on point. The food was excellent.
So tonight I ate dinner at the bar, they were not busy at all. The bartender was so rude to the servers it was a huge turn off and made my whole experience bad!
Amazing Wagyu

Steak was cold (Medium-rare), service was subpar, wine we asked for from the menu was not available but was offerred an alternative for $100 more than the $130 original ask, which ended up being ok but not $230 ok. All in all, farewell BLT, you are now officially below Morton's, Capital Grill and Del Frisco's in our choices.
Great food.
Outstanding Restaurant!  Very enjoyable dining experience.  Staff was very attentive.  Had the bone in Ribeye and steak was perfect.  Will definitely be visiting again when back in Charlotte.
Very upscale, great food and good service.
Poor service! Gave 3 stars because my pervious vist was pretty good. But this last time was so bad i dont think I'll go back!

I was told that on the down low BLT Steak had the best steak in Charlotte, so I had to finally check it out. I had the 30 something oz Porterhouse and it was definitely the best steak I have had in Charlotte so far. Great staff as well! Will be coming back.
Three words. Bone-in ribeye.
Great good and service. Pricey though.
Our new favorite steakhouse when uptown. Can't beat the service or food. Came during restaurant week and they did not skimp out!
Fantastic steak house located in the lobby of the Ritz Carlton.
Food was good and staff was friendly. No complaints.
The food was delicious.
The best quality, most consistent breakfast in Charlotte.  I frequent here regularly and have never had a disappointing experience.  The service and ambiance, also to die for.  Great work all.

Was here on a business trip and by chance stopped in for a cocktail with my bride.  We were greeted by what we call the "dream team" bartenders AJ and Greg.  They made us feel welcome and gave us great suggestions on what to drink and eat …
Great service and the steak was amazing. Desert was also good!
Wagyu Beef was phenomenal, service was great. Definately one of my favorite spots in Charlotte
Amazing steak however it is very pricey

I have been here for multiple special occasions booking through Open Table.  It has always been a top notch experience from the moment the valet opened our doors for us up until the end.  The popover's they give you instead of regular bread …
Good food great place for drinks and food

Excellent experience. The service is outstanding. The food is among the best I have ever had. My husband and I had tuna tartar for an appetizer, I had the salmon with hen of the woods as a side, my husband had lamb with ricotta gnocchi and …
I had the Mediterranean Sea Bass and it was amazing! The overall experience was a good one.
Butternut squash awesome  tuna tartar excellent. Popover great. Grits outstanding.  Presentation fantastic. Steak good.

Follow-up to the review below...  Following my initial review, Scott, the GM at BLT Steak, contacted me.  He was very professional and took full responsibility for our horrible first time at BLT.  He admitted that it was a transitional time …
food was good but $18 for a Shrimp Cocktail with 3 shrimp?  won't be back
Great they know how to cook a burger.

My husband and I came for dinner.  The atmosphere is nice however the food was mediocre. My husband had the ribeye... it was good but I've had better. I had the lamb it too was good but didnt wow me and the size was quite small compared to …
I have a favorite restaurant.  It is BLT Steak.  My husband and I celebrated my birthday last night.  Food was phenomenal, service was outstanding!  Loved our servers Cugo and Gordon.  Thank you!!
Wonderful food but pricy
Very expensive, but soooooo worth it. The food is excellent, as well the staff. I will go back again.
Excellent meal! Food was outstanding, atmosphere exceptional.  Looking forward to my next visit.
Fine dining done right. Exceptional customer service and a variety to choose from. Server D. King Cujo understands the art!
Went here for a birthday celebration and the food/staff were excellent

Please please do not go here it's a waste of time food is trash people's faces cry  very expensive I don't care if the food is right I will pay top dollar for anything I don't care as long as it's good this I can't see giving so much money …
Great food
their breakfast was great
Tries t o o hard.  The muffins are awesome though.

Service exceeded my expectations! Steaks are incredible too. Sides are perfectly seasoned and the tuna tartare is the best around. Highly recommended for a great business dinner or a celebratory night out!
Great for a drink, food and popovers are good but in Ritz Carlton so the prices are a little high for what you get.
Steak salad was OK.
damn good steaks!

We had theater tickets and had lunch at BLT today prior to the play.  This might possibly be the worst meal I've ever had in Charlotte.  The service wasn't much better and $11 for a mimosa is ridiculous.  I had a grilled steak and fontina …
Great food, generous portions, and very friendly staff. Would highly recommend to anyone in Charlotte.

Yum!! The braised short ribs were phenomenal 😋 Low key atmosphere, friendly waiter. Oh and their popovers before dinner were terrific. Also very accommodating, I have to be dairy free right now and they made sure everything was done …
Great experience of foods!
Incredible service, and absolutely amazing food! This is our favorite restaurant in Charlotte.

Manager came to our table 2-3 times and never acknowledged is just grabbed plates but I witnessed him speak to several other patrons. I tried to keep it simple with a BLT but it was not good at all. I will say I dined here in the past and I love the lobster Cobb salad.

This is a great place for food, ambiance, and drinks. Bring a date or your spouse and take some time to enjoy the restaurant or lounge. This place can get pretty busy, so be aware of the time you're going.
Quality food. Happy hour is treat value. Beer is expensive though
Had lunch there.  A bit overpriced for what you get.  I ate mostly bread when biting into the swordfish sandwich.  The bread, though, is probably the best bread I've had in a restaurant.

Have been here once for lunch which was very delicious and service was fair. However, came in for dinner recently and was given stale, old, ice tea and when asked the waiter for new tea he was offended that I asked. Not very good cocktail menu either.

We really enjoyed this place.  I had to attend a work meeting and came here for drinks, then stayed for dinner with work co-horts.  I have to say the service was spectacular, and the server really presented everything well.  I of course had …
Premium Service, food and price.
The food and experience were good, BUT extremely overpriced.
everything is amazing

Overall the food was very good but what made this place great was the service.  Very prompt, friendly, and accommodating.  They even give some nice snacks before your meal, we got pate and Gruyere cheese popovers that were fantastic.  They …

We had the worst experience we've ever had at a fine dining restaurant.  So we decided to try BLT on New Years Eve, we knew it would be a crazy night and service may be a little slow but surprisingly that wasn't the problem. Our experience …
Delicious steaks; melt in your mouth fantastic!
I have never sat down for dinner at BLT, however, I eat at the bar often. The bar menu is small, but very good and well priced.  Great place to mingle and unwind.
Steak is delicious

Of course, the popovers are a wonderful amuse-bouche,if you can call them that even though they are HUGE.  Steak was done perfectly.  Pricey a la carte sides were also just what you'd expect from a NY-style steakhouse.  Good service is essential at a place like this, and the southern-tinged hospitality did not disappoint.
excellent all around

Great food, great atmosphere, great service. It is what you expect of a fine dining place.  The french fries were over seasoned in garlic. We left the restaurant with the garlic taste and it would not go away hours after the meal. The server told us to order without garlic next time.
What a disappointment this place is. Having been to like restaurants in NYC by the same owner, it was a shocking experience. They can do a lot better.
This place should never see the tulips of Spring. Over rated food with pricing that shows the pride of the owner.
